group_1.narration: This is a little story from when we were in@Kamihama while the interiors of Mikazuki Villa@and Cafe LycoReco had been swapped.
On that day, we were going around@Kamihama with Tsuruno trying to find@a way to get back to our world...

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno and Team Mikazuki couldn't find@anything…

group_1.textRight: …I think we're better off returning to the@usual shopping district for now.

group_1.textLeft: It's been one disaster after another, but I'm@glad things are finally starting to calm down.
We're totally lost!

group_1.textRight: And of course Kurumi's drone always runs@out of battery during moments like these…

group_1.textLeft: We can't even use our phones!@We're so done!
We're from a completely different world,@so going to the cops won't really help…

group_1.textRight: We'll just have to ask for directions and@return to base.
That's—!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3023A01]Hmph!

group_1.textCenter: There's just no way to win if you're not a@Magical Girl, is there…
Looks like all we can do is run and call someone@in to assist.
There's gotta be some way we can distract@the Witch and escape…
Over there! I'll destroy the sand castle and@divert its attention that way.
CRAP! That just made it angry?!

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness we managed to escape@from the Labyrinth after all that.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I didn't see her, but I think a Magical@Girl rescued us.
Talk about a lifesaver.
I wanted to thank her, though…

group_1.textRight: But since we have no idea what a safe distance@from a Labyrinth is supposed to be...
All we could do was keep running...and wound@up someplace we don't recognize.

group_1.textLeft: And now we've got a whole 'nother problem@on our hands.
Oh, Takina, look! Look over there!@It's a sign!
That's just what we need!

group_1.textRight: I don't know… Doesn't it strike you as one of@those sketchy fortune-telling shops?

group_1.textLeft: But wouldn't it be lucky if they knew the way?!
Look, it's better than being lost!@I'll go ask for directions!

group_1.textRight: 'Scuse me, I saw the sign outside...

group_1.textLeft: Oh hey, a customer!@Got something troubling you?

group_1.textRight: Sure do…@We got lost.
We wanna head back to Mikazuki Villa…

group_1.textLeft: Mikazuki Villa… You mean where Iroha and@her team live?
Two girls in uniforms I don't recognize…@That means… AHA!
Roha told me!@You're like, from another world!
And I remember you guys interviewing@me before!
Hey hey hey!@What's it like being in another world?!

group_1.textRight: O-ooh… You're pretty chatty, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: So Chisatochi and Takki work at a place@called Cafe LycoReco.
So it's like, you're both employees and also@run a general help shop?

group_1.textRight: Yep, that's right! That's the gist!
Takki…?

group_1.textLeft: Chisatochi and Takki!
See, we're friends now, so that means you@gotta have nicknames!
Ahaha, sorry 'bout that.@It's Emiri's thing.
So like, you're looking for a way home!

group_1.textRight: Right! We were asking around today too!

group_1.textLeft: Then why don't you stay here at my shop and@we can do some consulting together?!

group_1.textRight: By together, you mean you want us@to help listen?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! It's important to have a lot of people@you can get information from, right?
With so many folks visiting the counseling room,@you might find someone who knows what's up!

group_1.textRight: …Right, that's true.

group_1.textLeft: And besides, what you guys do is similar to@what we do here!

group_1.narration: "The two of you at Cafe LycoReco@assist the people of your city,@and help solve their problems!"

group_1.textRight: Right, we're both helping the people around us.
That's right! Hey, that's really great!@The counseling room!
But we need to return to Tsuruno and the@others and give them our report...

group_1.textLeft: I already got in touch with Tsurupi and got@her reply! Check it out!

group_1.narration: Sorry we all got separated!!@I'm so glad you're okay tho@Gotta head to work at Banbanzai@Emily'll show you guys the way home!@Sorry about this! Safe travels home!

group_1.textLeft: So there!

group_1.textRight: Emily's quick on her feet when it comes to@these things.

group_1.textLeft: When you wanna have fun, you gotta act fast@or you're wasting time!

group_1.textRight: You're really into this, aren't you, Miss Emily?!

group_1.textLeft: Right, right! And hey, just call me Emily!

group_1.textRight: Got it! Good to meetcha, Emily!
Um, "when you wanna have fun"...?!@Have they forgotten what we're here for?!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha… They're two peas in a pod, huh?
Ooh, that voice! Here comes our first job!

group_1.textRight: Right then, let's do this!
